newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Schering EPS view raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Schering EPS view raised.

text.p: Gruntal & Co on Thursday raised its 1997 and 1998 earnings estimates for Schering-Plough Corp and reiterated its strong buy rating for the company.
-- said raised its earnings estimate to $1.90 per share from $1.88 for 1997, and to $2.20 from $2.18 for 1998, with numbers adjusted for a recent 2-for-1 stock split.
-- said introduced a 1999 earnings estimate of $2.52 per share.
-- said raised one-year target price to $54 from $47 due to new higher earnings estimates and a stronger product flow.
-- said expects company to sustain a 15 percent growth rate in earnings per share over the next two years, compared with Gruntal's projection of 13 percent industry growth rate.
-- said shares remain one of best values in the drug group, with its 1998 estimated price-to-earnings ratio of 20.3 representing a five percent discount to its global peers.
